<rule id="springboot-parent-pom-to-quarkus-00000" xmlns="http://windup.jboss.org/schema/jboss-ruleset">
            <when>
                <or>
                    <xmlfile in="pom.xml" matches="/m:project/m:parent[m:groupId/text() = 'org.springframework.boot' and m:artifactId/text() = 'spring-boot-starter-parent']">
                        <namespace prefix="m" uri="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0"/>
                    </xmlfile>
                    <xmlfile in="pom.xml" matches="/m:project/m:parent[m:groupId/text() = 'org.springframework.boot' and m:artifactId/text() = 'spring-boot-parent']">
                        <namespace prefix="m" uri="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0"/>
                    </xmlfile>
                </or>
            </when>
            <perform>
                <hint category-id="mandatory" effort="1" title="Replace the Spring Parent POM with Quarkus BOM">
                    <message>
                        Replace the Spring Parent POM with Quarkus BOM in `<dependencyManagement>` section of the application's `pom.xml` file.  
                        Leverage the link below to fulfill this change.
                    </message>
                    <link href="https://quarkus.io/guides/maven-tooling#build-tool-maven" title="Quarkus - Building applications with Maven Guide"/>
                </hint>
            </perform>
        </rule>
